body: A vampire lord is a ruthless, calculating noble or other figure of authority that dominates her political landscape.
name: Vampire Lord

sections.ac: 28, touch 14, flat-footed 25 (+7 armor, +1 deflection, +2 Dex, +1 dodge, +7 natural)
sections.special_attacks: blood drain, children of the night, create spawn, dominate (DC 22), energy drain (2 levels, DC 22), greater spell combat, improved spell combat, spell combat (-2 attack, +2 concentration, double bonus), spellstrike
sections.melee: +1 frost longsword +20/+15 (1d8+11/17-20 plus 2d6), slam +13 (1d4+8 plus energy drain)
sections.languages: Common, Dwarven, Elven, Giant, Sylvan, Undercommon

sections.gear: +1 breastplate, +1 frost longsword, amulet of natural armor +1, belt of physical might +2 (Str, Dex), cloak of resistance +2, headband of alluring charisma +4, ring of protection +1, granite and diamond dust (worth 500 gp), 835 gp

sections.body:
Before Combat The vampire lord casts stoneskin on herself.

During Combat The vampire casts cloak of winds, expeditious retreat, greater invisibility, and shield on herself. She uses accurate strike against better-defended opponents, Mobility to avoid flanking, and Flanking Foil to negate sneak attacks.
